tgt_original: sarvaratna mahāśobhavibhūṣaṇa namo'stu te || 5 ||  vajrateja mahāteja vajraprabha mahādyute |  jinaprabha mahājvāla buddhaprabha namo'stu te || 6 ||  vajraketu mahāketu mahādhvaja dhanaprada |  ākāśaketo mahāyaṣṭi tyāgadhvaja namo'stu te || 7 ||
guhyapūja mahāpūja buddhapūja namo'stu te || 13 ||  vajrarakṣa mahāvarma kavacāgrya mahādṛḍha |
